title: Repeated Unexplained Disconnection
body: Been occurring a lot after 5.19 patch, I get disconnected in a game without any ping problems, re-logging, restarting computer,restarting wifi have all been tried and no good results were produced. This lost me some lp because i could never tell when it was going to dc me out. Also got a low priority que due to this, Can riot at least remove my low priority? They already owe me at least 20 LP from a game where i got registered as a leaver,  but i participated and got my lane (bot lane, was support) snowballing. So unfair

replies.body:
Hey DeadEyeGamer, 

So you may have a problem where Client isn't connecting with your computer. You should try Riots connection KB and it should fix you up. 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Good luck!
